 FEATURES

 ÃƒÂ¢Ã‹Å“Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ AMAZING COLLECTION OF LIVE WALLPAPERS
 Glowing Rings, Matrix, Rotating Earth, Hive, Beer Bubbles, Space Travel, Blue Waves and many more!

 ÃƒÂ¢Ã‹Å“Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ DESIGN YOUR OWN LIVE WALLPAPERS

 ÃƒÂ¢Ã‹Å“Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ BONUS MUSIC TRACKS

 Please read before you buy:

 New content and new features coming soon! Thank you for downloading Live Wallpapers!
